ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Diable 2
ygData.msgSnippet: wah i didnt found any luck amulet but i found a amulet that increase gold drop by about 50% i found at least 10 gems 2 skull (one is flawed, upgraded by gem
ygData.messageBody:
wah i didnt found any luck amulet but
i found a amulet that increase gold drop
by about 50%

i found at least 10 gems 2 skull (one is flawed,
upgraded by gem shrine found in first game)

I was kick off server also around 1200 am
but when i log back in i was still lvl 12
even though i never exit and save once.

Febon

From: "LKW" <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 8:46 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Diable 2


> I also got it, play it to lvl 10 barbarian. Notice how many necro and sor
> out there? KNN I think even pally is more than barb. The least shld be
ama
> and barb. I think there is a bug in D2. The last game which I play to lvl
> 10, kena kick out of game, and when I return, I go back to lvl 5!!!!
*&%&%#
>
> In the end play again till 3am, managed to get back to lvl 9 only. Good
> thing is tat I find a very good staff tat increase quite a few of casting
> skills and a set armor tunic. Both I used to 'twink' my sor later.
>
> Any sor tips pls share, I'm training my barb to look for gp and magical
> stuffs (barb got a skill to increase %age to find magical stuff).
>
> I also go a luck amulet, which I found 2 fire, 2 ruby, 3 skull and 1 emer
> gems after I wear it, but knn all these gems are gone when my char
crashed.
> Lucky I still got the amulet and found 1 fire, 1 ice and 1 skull gem
> later...
>
